root: ^Their mother always seemed to care about $/% and $/% alone.
^His lunch would have notes from her while Cecil was stuck with a limp sandwich.
^Sometimes a banana but he was allergic.
^but when he was he would only ask about $/%'s baseball games.
^When it seemed that $/% could only become a more and more glowing, perfect person -
^Cecil faded more and more into obscurity.
